primary.description: true if this is the primary sub-domain
true if this is the primary sub-domain

uname.description: The unique short name of the organization. Used as the domain prefix and in monitoring
The unique short name of the organization. Used as the domain prefix and in monitoring

next.description: A link to the next page of results

previous.description: A link to the previous page of results

self.description: A link to this page of results

count.description: The number of items in this page of results (the number of items in the data array).

total.description: The total number of items in the result set.

message.description: A detailed description of the response or error

reason.description: A description of the response code.

A description of the response code.

400.description: Bad Request - The request is malformed

401.description: Unauthorized - The action cannot be performed in the system

403.description: Forbidden - The authenticated user does not have permission to perform this action

404.description: Not Found - The resource does not exist

409.description: Conflict - The action cannot be performed in the system
